title: Integrated Multilingual Approach (IPA)-Based Mathematics Pedagogy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary mathematical concepts and foundational knowledge for teaching professions
context.additional_context: Enhancing the competencies of pre-service and in-service teachers in designing effective mathematics instruction for multilingual learners.

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to integrate linguistic and cultural contexts when designing math lessons by applying the 5-dimensional pedagogy of IPA
Learners can analyze and improve their teaching practices using practical tools through a reflective cyclical process
Learners develop cross-curricular strategies using translation and mediation skills when explaining math concepts in multilingual environments

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Discussion Board, Assignment Submission System)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
